turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi how are you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Doing good. How are you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Doing well. How can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I wanted to get some coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That sounds like a nice time. Which kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was thinking about a venti macchiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay did you want it iced or regular?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well, it's a little bit warm so I was thinking about getting it iced.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That sounds good. Did you want whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, give me that whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great so that's an iced macchiato with whipped cream size venti. Did you want any syrups?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, syrup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay what milk did you want to use.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Whole milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. And can you help me figure out which starbucks is closest to you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, it's the one on 1800 Irvine in San Francisco.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay I'll place your order with the starbucks on Irving in San Francisco. It'll be ready soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I think I got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, I hope your macchiato is refreshing. Have a good day.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
